message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd be interested. I'm offering it to you for $110. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $90 is a good starting point, I'm looking for something closer to $100 to make this work. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $95 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to meet you at $92. Is that something you'd consider?
